text: The Englishman and the Girl is a 1910 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithCharles Keil. A Companion to D. W. GriffithThe Englishman and the Girl and stars Charles Craig, Mary Pickford, and George Nichols. ==Actors== * Charles Craig as Albert Wilberforce * Mary Pickford as The Girl * George Nichols as Mr. Thayer * Kate Bruce as Mrs. Thayer * Gladys Egan as The Child * Ruth Hart as A Friend * Dorothy West as A Friend/Member of Dramatic Club * Francis J. Grandon as In Store/Member of Dramatic Club * Anthony O'Sullivan as In Store/Member of Dramatic Club ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Englishman and the Girl
